TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit AddingNewEventArgs extends System.EventArgs

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类提供数据事件，指示某个项是要添加到集合。The class provides data for the event, which signals that an item is about to be added to a collection. 该事件允许程序员来说，事件处理程序内的，通过设置提供的新对象的选项为这个新项的属性。The event gives the programmer, within the event handler , the option of supplying the new object by setting the property to this new item. 如果未设置此属性，集合通常将使用适当的类型的默认构造函数来构造一个新项。If this property is not set, the collection will typically use the default constructor of the appropriate type to construct a new item. 在任一情况下，会将新项添加到集合。In either case, the new item will be added to the collection. 如果集合还实现接口，将暂时添加项，等待后续 commit 或 rollback。If the collection also implements the interface, the item will be provisionally added, waiting a subsequent commit or rollback. 此事件常用在类中的数据绑定方案，如和。This event is commonly used in data-binding scenarios, within classes such as and . 有关如何处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用类来处理事件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the class to handle the event. 此代码示例摘自[如何： 使用 Windows 窗体 BindingSource 自定义项添加](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-customize-item-addition-with-the-windows-forms-bindingsource.md)。This code example is part of a larger example provided in [How to: Customize Item Addition with the Windows Forms BindingSource](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-customize-item-addition-with-the-windows-forms-bindingsource.md). [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.DataConnector.AddingNew#8](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataConnector.AddingNew/CPP/form1.cpp#8)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataConnector.AddingNew#8](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataConnector.AddingNew/CS/form1.cs#8)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataConnector.AddingNew#8](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataConnector.AddingNew/VB/form1.vb#8)]

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class using no parameters.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认构造函数设置属性设置为`null`。The default constructor sets the property to `null`. 一个值，则该值`null`表明，如果未显式设置此属性，集合会采用标准的步骤，以提供要向其本身添加新项。A value that is `null` indicates that, if the does not explicitly set this property, the collection will take standard steps to provide a new item to add to itself.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(object newObject) cil managed

span.span: An to use as the new item value.

summary.span: 使用指定的对象作为新项初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class using the specified object as the new item.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 构造函数设置属性设置为`newObject`参数。The constructor sets the property to the `newObject` parameter. 此对象将用作新项添加到关联的集合，除非由事件处理程序更新此属性。This object will be used as the new item to be added to the associated collection, unless this property is updated by the event handler.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Object ^ NewObject { System::Object ^ get(); void set(System::Object ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置要添加到绑定列表的对象。

span.span: Gets or sets the object to be added to the binding list.

value.span: 要作为新项添加到关联的集合中的 。

span.span: The to be added as a new item to the associated collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果属性设置为`null`，它指示集合是执行标准操作，其中通常涉及到创建适当的类型使用其默认构造函数，并添加到集合的对象。If the property is set to `null`, it indicates that the collection is to take the standard action, which typically entails creating an object of the appropriate type using its default constructor, and then adding it to the collection. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用类来处理事件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the class to handle the event. 此代码示例摘自[如何： 使用 Windows 窗体 BindingSource 自定义项添加](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-customize-item-addition-with-the-windows-forms-bindingsource.md)。This code example is part of a larger example provided in [How to: Customize Item Addition with the Windows Forms BindingSource](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-customize-item-addition-with-the-windows-forms-bindingsource.md).
